document_data.name: ''Glorious Diamond Necklace of the Airborne''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''glorious diamond necklace of the airborne''''' was an enchanted [[amulet]] from [[Kir Sabal]] of [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The ''necklace of the airborne'' was a piece of [[diamond]]-encrusted jewelry.
document_data.Powers: The enchantments of this necklace made the wearer light as air and strong as wind. Additionally, the amulet enhanced the wearers' arcane magics.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Asharra]]: the aarakocra [[wizard]] leader of Kir Sabal in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
